author: Special Correspondent
text: The State government on Wednesday named Dr. M. Sarada Menon of Schizophrenia Care and Research Foundation (SCARF) for the Avvaiyar Award for 2016. An official release stated that Chief Minister Jayalalithaa has chosen Dr. Menon for the Award for her service in the field of mental health. “She founded SCARF for the welfare of the mentally-challenged,” the release stated. The Award carries a cash prize of Rs. 1 lakh, an 8 gram gold medal and a certificate.
title: Sarada Menon to get ‘Avvaiyar Award’
